content.detailedDescription:
Two objects were seen in the sky above bolton , greater manchester. the witness said the objects seemed to be rotating and looked very different each time they did. they were very shiny and silver in appearance.
one disappeared into cloud and the other was the one which was photographed.
the incident and photographs were reported in the bolton news on 26th august 2015 and they are available to view online.
content.summary: The observer saw two different objects, one disappeared into cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling by car with a friend outside of trondheim when i saw this red light, i took my camara and at the same time i screemed to my friend to stop, but she told me , ana i can not do that it is a free way! so that was it. i saw from far away that they disapear into the white light that was covering part of the mountain and that was all...At list i could take one picture!  my friend didn`t see any thing there was no time for that.
content.summary: I saw three red and bright objects  moving to a very white light that cover part of a mountain.

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en una ventana tomando fotos de la hermosa luna cuando estas tres "rayas" horizontales, una de ellas blanca y las otras dos azules,  pasan en el momento que yo tomaba la foto...No fue sino hasta que amplie la foto en mi computador que me di cuenta de que fue lo que paso ante mis ojos, una belleza y deleite que disfrute despues del evento por la amplacion de lo que mis ojos vieron como un veloz destello.
content.summary: Forma alargada ,, como una tira que vuela

content.detailedDescription: I was about 7 years old playing in a field on our property bout 300 yards back of house next to woods when this small figure made itself visible to me, don't remember a whole lot of conversation and was told i wouldn't remember it till years later, when i did wasn't sure if was a dream or imagination of a boy, but remember an alien asking me questions and telling me ,their were here to help us not destroy this world and to try and find peace that in later years may join them in a federation of planets in peace, when i think back on this today i gotta wander if they thought our species would be so violent?
content.summary: Alien my size bout 3' tall, grey in cloor large head small body

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the beautiful star the orion the 3 star straight line and the sirius and the seven pleiades star then try to find the milky way but was the light too much city light maybe can see bright on it could be the milky way then suddenly i saw a white shining blinking flash light appear one time after 7 second it blink again as it goes toward north west just two times only i saw it blink flash but the blink flash light was quite bigger than a sirius star. this is so unimaginable.. this is around 3:47am like that... on my balcony again on 27august 2015 when everything is silent
content.summary: I was looking at the beautiful star the orion the 3 star straight line and the sirius and the seven pleiades star then try to find the milky way but was the light too much city light maybe can see bright on it could be the milky way then suddenly i sawufo

content.detailedDescription: Was on mt way back from bangor in north wales approx 30 miles from home saw ufo at first thought it was helicopter this was at 230amit followed us then at a long strait piece of road about 15 miles from home it shot from the right to the left then ahead and hoverd over the middle ofroad dont know what happend next next i remember is we were 6 miles from home and the ufo was ahead of us it stayed with us all the way home while looking at it through binnoculas we noticed a jellyfish type entity floating up into the sky
content.summary: Followed by ufo loss of time saw large jellyfish looking thing rise into the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was about 12yo at the time, out playing in the street with a friend, my friend went inside. i continued riding my bike then heard a faint buzzing which started to get louder, i assumed it was a broken street light so started looking around to see which one it was and from the eastern end of the street i saw a light in the distance coming closer. at this point i assumed it was a helicopter but thought it strange that there was no engine noise. as the object grew closer i noticed that it was in fact 2 x circular lights (smaller light in front approx. 100ft across/ bigger light behind approx. 150-200ft) traveling no more than 250-300ft from the ground. when the object was directly over me it seemed to slow down and i could feel a large amount of static in the air, so much that all the hairs on my arms and legs were standing on end. as the object moved away in a western direction it seemed to speed up, i tried to follow and had it in my sight for another 5mins when it seemed to accelerate at an immense speed in the blink of an eye. unfortunately had nothing with me to take a picture or video with.
content.summary: Heard buzzing, then 2 x large circular lights appeared, flew overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was about 12yo at the time, out playing in the street with a friend, my friend went inside. i continued riding my bike then heard a faint buzzing which started to get louder, i assumed it was a broken street light so started looking around to see which one it was and from the eastern end of the street i saw a light in the distance coming closer. at this point i assumed it was a helicopter but thought it strange that there was no engine noise. as the object grew closer i noticed that it was in fact 2 x circular lights (smaller light in front approx. 100ft across/ bigger light behind approx. 150-200ft) traveling no more than 250-300ft from the ground. when the object was directly over me it seemed to slow down and i could feel a large amount of static in the air, so much that all the hairs on my arms and legs were standing on end. as the object moved away in a western direction it seemed to speed up, i tried to follow and had it in my sight for another 5mins when it seemed to accelerate at an immense speed in the blink of an eye. unfortunately had nothing with me to take a picture or video with.
content.summary: Heard buzzing, then 2 x large circular lights appeared, flew overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my living room and noticed a lot of lights in the distance.  looking out my window i thought it was a plane but noticed it was very rectangular and had too many lights to be a normal plane. i believe it had a combination of red and white lights. there seemed to be a pattern of sorts on the body of the aircraft.  the first thought that came to mind was the visor on lamar burton's character from star trek. except stack them making it a double. ..It's really hard to describe i will try to draw it.   it also blinked out then came back on.As it was flying all the lights went completely out and then came back on.  the flight pattern was different as if it was inching along instead of a smooth flight path. it was very slow moving and kind of staggering in rhythm. how it even got my attention is the fact that it was flying below the tree line. from where i normally sit i could see the ufo in a lower part of my window than normal olanes. i have been feeling very paranoid since i have seen it. there have been more airplanes and helicopters coming around my house. ..More than usual. i feel they may be coming for me or my son. this sighting is happening within a year of me being hospitalized for a random one time event of extreme virtigo. my 3 year old son last month was looking up in the sky during the day and started shouting "stars" and took off running as if chasing something. ...I could not see anything.  so i am becoming very worried i feel like they searching for us.
content.summary: . rectangle shaped ufo flying way too low for a plane

content.detailedDescription: I was staying in a cabin near gratiot lake in the upper peninsula of michigan. i went outside to pee and possibly sleep in the hammock outside. i walked outside and around to the front of the cabin which faces east and the lake. as i was considering sleeping in the hammock i "marked my territory" by peeing on the trees the hammock was attached to. as i was marking the second tree and facing the lake i noticed a light and looked up to see a bright object flying in an erratic swooping fashion. my first thought was something small and in front of me like an insect. i saw it fly behind a tree and realized it was inside of the low hanging clouds. it appeared to be disc shaped. it was lit up when i first noticed it but then blinked out like turning all the lights out. when this happened it left a light trail. it kept blinking on and off like this as it flew west. it continued to travel in the swooping erratic flight pattern heading generally west. i lost sight of it as it passed over the treetops toward the west. as soon as it was out of sight i freaked out and my heart started racing. i decided that i wasn't going to sleep outside in the hammock. when i got back inside i had my girlfriend feel my heart which was racing. she thought i had seen a bear. i couldn't sleep the rest of the night.
content.summary: A flying object blinking on and off with white light flew over me in a swooping whirly fashion till it disappeared over the trees.

content.detailedDescription: Was in my backyard with my son and my brother when my son told us to look up at the sky,we witnessed about 5 to seven metallic objects (silver) flying in a triangular form separately in perfect motion.They where flying from the south east heading towards the northwest.The skies were clear and blue.No airplanes were near nor around. observed for about 1 minute until the trees behind our home blocked our view,didn't have time to pull out my cell phone to record because we were in awe and amazed of what we were witnessing.We are 100% sure that those were not airplanes.Wow.
content.summary: Witnessed them passing through the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was playing tag with two of my brothers outside in our yard. we had been at it for quite sometime and needed to rest and take a break. my brothers went inside the house to get a drink i had asked them to bring me something to drink. i had laid back on my elbows on the ground, resting. within a few minutes i heard a deep low pulsating hum. but i couldn't tell exactly where it was originating from. it started to get louder within 15 to 20 seconds. the sound was above me, coming from my left, i saw a silver gray disc shaped craft moving very slowly just skimming the tree tops by about 15 to 20 feet. it traveled in straight path over the clearing of my yard, which was approx. 150 feet, and then over the trees again. as it was traveling over the clearing of my yard it was almost directly over-head as i noticed 4 dome shaped lights flashing bright intermittently. the dome shaped lights were approx. 6 to 8 feet in diameter. all white in color. no other colors were visible. after the craft had cleared the span of the yard, my two brothers and my mother came running out from the house. my mother frantically asked me what that hum and vibration was and i told her what i had just witnessed. she was in shock. the vibration rattled the windows and knick knacks inside the house. later that evening we heard on the radio that others had seen it in the same area. the thing that impressed me the most was how it could stay airborne to be moving so slow! to this day it still seems so surreal. i can still see the entire event in my mind as if it happened today. extremely vivid!!!! i remembered being disappointed that my brothers didn't see it. but they certainly heard it and felt it vibrate. i also remember feeling scared and anxious after it was over, not while i witnessed it happening. although i wad young at the, i did realize that what i was seeing wasn't a normal thing to experience. it just wasn't normal looking. the very existence of this craft.
content.summary: Heard deep low hum looked up saw disc shaped craft skimming tree tops. moving very slow.

content.detailedDescription:
Hovering spacecraft-like object moving side to side then up and down. constant flashing of lights in sequence going all around the object. literally vanished within minutes. 
no planes were in sight.  observed this from bedroom window.
content.summary: Pink flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: It was sometime around july of 2013. i was in my bedroom. i was looking out the window because i was expecting the delta aquarrids meteor shower if i recall correctly. there were three of my friends outside in the grass field of the apartments. around 11:15, the three girls left to a friend's place somewhere not far from the apartment area. apparently, the meteor shower began. i stayed there to look at the meteor shower. around 11:30 pm, i was still looking at the meteor shower since the girls were still at a friend's house. i was enjoying the view with awe due to my interest in astronomy. eventually, i turned to my right, and something from the sky appeared. at first, i thought that it was an aircraft or balloons perhaps. as it came closer, i noticed that it wasn't any of those. eventually, this object was moving at a steady speed of about a foot per second, about 15 feet over the apartment's swimming pool. this object appeared to change into different figure continually. it did not have a fixed shape. it appeared to have an appearance of a cloud almost. it was about 20 feet from me. at first, i thought i was just seeing things, but my sister was also looking out the window. she was getting scared and said:"al? what is that?". immediately i ducked down hoping that this unknown object would not see me. this object was hovering/floating over the swimming pool for about 10 seconds. then, it began to change course to the northwest. it emitted no light. i could not tell its actual color due to the yellow lights of the swimming pool area. it emitted no sound whatsoever. there was no wind at all during this time of that night. as it floated away, it appeared to emit some light. when the girls came back, the object was completely gone. i could not sleep for most of that night. at morning, i told some of my friends of what i saw. i did not considered it, or classified it, as a ufo as most people think it means. but i did identify it as an unidentified object. i told my mom about it. but she said it could have been the devil. i told my next door neighbor, james, and told him what i saw. his opinion was that i could have been a military drone that he have been hearing about in the news. i told him that it was illogical because it did not have a familiar aircraft shape or design and that there was no sound coming from it. for days after the event i did not get enough sleep because of staying up to see if the object would ever come back. it never did. later, i found out that there was a us air force recruiting area exactly where the unknown object flew. regardless of what i knew, i kept the matter confidential to myself and destroyed anything i wrote about it. it was until about late december of 2013 that i told an elder in my congregation (or church). and it was in july 2015 that i recorded an account of the matter
content.summary: Weird cloud-looking object floating/hovering c.15 feet off the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
When: during the summer of 1977 (my best guess as to the year), during the day (probably between 10am and 2pm) as it was only a day camp.
where: at pena adobe historical site, abutting interstate 80, north of fairfield, and just before vacaville on pena adobe road,on the east side of the highway..

these accounts have been delved from my memory and subconscious years following the events.
my search for understanding started when i began to self analyze why i had had recurring nightmares, for years after that summer, of a large, bleach white, cow's thigh bone chasing me. a bizarre, and somewhat ridiculous thing to be scared of. even after the dreams stopped i had a persistent fear of the image in my mind. i was never scared of an actual cow's thighbone though. i discovered that the large white thigh bone was actually an alien, humanoid in shape, white, and somewhere about my size.

throughout the weeks i was at camp i had a number of instances of missing time leaden with fear.

the most detailed experience is of the counselors taking a large group of us kids on a walk; then waking up on the ground (with a gap in my memory of how i'd gotten there). everyone on the hike awoke on the ground in a clearing. i have an image of numerous aliens some taller and brilliantly white, and other shorter ones, in some way interacting with people. i recall someone noticing something weird with their watch. i'm not sure what. there seemed to be a transition between the time when people who were awake and were alright with the aliens' presence and when people started to return to 'normal' awareness and be bothered by what had happened and was going on. eventually we all continued with our normal camp activities, but a number of kids were sent home early (or the entire camp?) due to a sudden illness that was going around. i know many people were out of sorts and upset the rest of that day.

i also have images of being amongst the trees there and a small alien there - and i have a terrible fear of being taken.

another time i remember an image of a large glowing thing hovering over part of the camp. it is luminous, possibly ovoid, primarily glowing white with multiple other colors mixed in. i remember feeling something from it, as if it made a sound,but it didn't.
content.summary: Mass abduction, multiple times, at pena adobe summer camp

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south bound on hwy 13 coming back from kansas city driving on hwy 13 about 20 miles from springfield, missouri. i noticed the object because of the bright white light coming from the front of the object. the light approaching me from the south traveling north directly above the hwy.I thought the object was a helicopter using a spotlight when i first noticed it. as the object and the car i was driving engaged each other i was able to look up at what i estimate to be approximately 100 feet above the car at three very large round lights on the bottom of the object. the very large white lights were positioned in a triangle configuration. as the object became directly above the vehicle the lights grew extremely bright for 5-10 seconds. when the lights became dark i look directly behind the vehicle to locate the object and observed it 1-3 miles north of the current position of my vehicle traveling north above hwy 13. i never felt threatened by the object at any time but more stunned and captivated once i wasn't able to understand what i was seeing. i felt warm during the increase in light as it was above the vehicil. the duration of the event was approximately 5 minutes
content.summary: Triangle shape object with three very large lights the got brighter when they were above vehical

content.detailedDescription: At around 6:15 or so on august 26, 2015, i had just gotten off of 295 and was driving on rt. 70 east when i noticed what appeared to be a rectangular object in the sky a little above the tree lines in the distance. it was a dull (unreflective) solid gray color, and was moving north in a slow descent. the speed of this object was unremarkable--about the speed that planes appear to be moving when observed from the ground. it did not have the shape of a plane, however. it disappered behind the trees moments after i first saw it.
content.summary: Rectangular object in sky over marlton, nj

content.detailedDescription:
I was a young boy in about grade 3. i was hospitalized for an operation to my left ear. the event occurred at night before my operation in a hospital room and my only witness was sound asleep (he was in bad shape). i had my bed next to the window when awakened by a noise, and when i looked for the noise there it was, plain as day, an orb, at the window, hovering and hitting the window. the object was like a basketball lit up like a flashlight. i was scared like hell and hid under the blankets. i tried to make sense of what i had just seen, was it someone with a bright flashlight, could the noise be the flagpole, should i press the emergency button beside my bed? i mustered enough courage to look a 2nd time; the object was still there, but lower to my left towards a lower floor (my room was on an upper floor). scared again, i went back under my blanket never to look back. the next day, i told my mother, but her non reaction reassured me implicitly that i shouldn’t have anything to be afraid of. i remember the event like it was yesterday because of the intense fear.






(in real life, i'm a social worker)
content.summary: Basketball orb, very bright, `knocked` at window, scared like hell

content.detailedDescription: We were at the virgin casino in  mesquite nevada around 1 or 2 am when we herd a helicopter flying over so we looked up and following it was what looked like a shooting star coming from the west heading east following the helicopter but almost as soon as we noticed the star light object it took a 90 degree turn with out slowing down towards the north east and sped off with out a trace. i was with a friend of mine and another man sitting outside talking at the time when this all happened.  there may be other witnesses and the helicopter probably has flight records for the time.  it looked like the helicopter was some kind of flight for life helicopter maybe
content.summary: Ufo followed hellicopter till we noticed it looked like a shooting star until it took 90 degree turn at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home with my girlfriend down pysons rd, broadstairs, kent, i spotted a hovering ball like light to the left of me over the fields, i pulled the car over and kept watching with my girlfriend and it kept flashing between blue and reddish lights and hovering but swaying slightly , i took my phone to take a picture and when i looked at the pic it turned out white but golf ball looking in texture, i took another picture and at that exact moment it shot of at a slight incline to the right going south east at tremendous speed that we lost sight of it but the camera caught the movement and blur of the object leaving. iv felt as though i wasn't looking at a normal craft the iv never seen anything move so quickly 
when i got home i took.A picture of the moon above my home using same camera to show it was in a different position to the object and the reflection from the moon pic was much much more reflective and bright.
content.summary: Ball of light in the sky flashing while stationary took pictures and shot off at imcredible speed

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Driving north on i-5. event occurred around 9pm friday night. there was an 18 wheeler in front of me at a distance of 100 ft. the right side of the road consisted of a line of trees, the left side was dark and i couldn't see clearly. i believe it consisted of either a line of trees or a large patch of grass/dirt. i noticed a light appear from between the 18 wheeler and the line of trees on the right side. the lights slowly moved their way into the trees. i saw them flickering between the trees as i kept driving. it took them about 3-5 seconds to move from where they appeared to the thicket of the trees. i could see the a light flickering for about half a minute amongst the trees. then one light (not sure if the lights merged, or if the other light separated from the other and left the area) flew up and over the i-5 interstate in a sine wave motion and quickly glided to the other side. where it appeared to have landed and or flown really low until it disappeared from my line of sight. the object appeared to be a mile to half a mile north of where i was. i was driving 77mph towards the event. this occurred an exit before the sign indicating the firebaugh, ca exit was coming up, or two exits before firebaugh. attached please find an image of the right side of the road when i drove back down. i did check to see it wasn't a glare appear on my windshield, and there isn't an overpass in the area so i know it wasn't highlights from an elevated road. the attached picture should indicate that the trees were crop trees, lined up like an orchard. what struck me is the ability for this/these things to maneuver among such a narrow path.
content.summary: 2 white lights travelled east then west over i-5

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north and my attention was drawn to the sky and when i saw this incredible shining object that seemed to hover, it was gone as if it transported immediately to another location.
i was in awe. i had an adrleline rush and got chills. as if i spotted something i wasn't supposed to see. as zi acknowledged this siting to myself, it immediately changed location to i feel somewhere nearby. i knew when i saw the object that it was a ufo.
i personally feel they have been around since i was born. and we don't use our perceptions to see more than 3 dimensions.
sorry i didn't have time to record it. it happened fast while i was driving.
content.summary: It was stationary as if observing or getting ready to transport to another dimension. the shiniest purist metal i have ever seen.

content.detailedDescription: Was the night of guitar lessons, i was 14 mom and me left around 9:30 pm she said we'd take the back way home main to high and on millborne rd we went north we got right behind the state inst. at blossom rd and there it was as wide as two football feilds going from house to house just sitting there over the road the lights went from lt to rt large rect. shape looking like to smaller rect.At each side rotating and pulsing white red yellow blue over and over the craft was a disk shape round at top and bottom funneling down to bottom a bit to lower area ,mom pulled in a turn around on blossom we stopped and watched this thing , i got out on the windows edge not a sound coming from it we were less then a quarter of a mile away it was so huge, mom asked again what should we do,i said we're not going under it! go back to apple creek and up rt44 so she did and soon as we started turning out of blossom and back on millborne it shot straight up and looked like a small red ball you heard me right a small little red ball and stayed there untill we got all the way over on 44 straight across from it and then seamed as if it moved with us straight north untill we got home as soon as we did that small red ball zipped like nothing i have ever seen to the north east and in a flash it was gone, oh their out ther allright, we made a report with sheriff they laughted and said we probley saw a combine or tractor , and thats as far as it ever got. and thats my close encounter and i'm sticking to it, still to this very day ask my mom and she'll start shaking and say "i don't know what the hell it was but it was there !" thanks for believing
content.summary: Mother and i left apple creek on millborne got to blossom and pulled in there. both said at same time . what the hell is that ! i climbed out of window to hear nothing . over top a amish house and the deal's house wow.  and still more story.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside the front door of my grandmothers house for a smoke when i noticed something unusual a flying objects i can only describe as light that moved abnormally large
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription: We were in jerome az. doing some sight seeing. we were at the museum. all pretty uneventful. the ufo's were not even seen until a couple of months later when viewing the pics s
content.summary: When the pics were taken we did not see the ufo's my sister took the pics

content.detailedDescription: We were in jerome az. doing some sight seeing. we were at the museum. all pretty uneventful. the ufo's were not even seen until a couple of months later when viewing the pics s
content.summary: When the pics were taken we did not see the ufo's my sister took the pics

content.detailedDescription: In back yard looked up and saw what i thought to be a large aircraft flanked on either side by two smaller aircraft,but after watching objects for a few minutes could not tell if it was multiple aircraft or one large aircraft. object continued in a northerly direction until it disappeared from view. felt curious about what object was.
content.summary: Metallic object or objects moving south to north, east of bakersfield

content.detailedDescription: It was a small fireball steady for about 2 minutes and a small drop until it burnt out in small downsize line
content.summary: Orange fireball

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from dropping off a co-worker after work. i was driving down rancier ave. when i saw a strange light hovering a little past the park. at first i thought it could be a helicopter, since i live in killeen,tx rite next to ft hood and there are always helicopters in the air.  as i got closer i could tell it was a triangle shaped craft not a helicopter, i couldn't hear any noise from it. i pulled into the park to continue watching it. it stayed in the same place for about 15 minutes, then slowly moved over the park. i opened the sunroof in my car to watch it as it slowly flew rite over my head. then it changed direction from heading west going parallel with rancier to going south-west. a few seconds after it made the turn it vanished.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watched triangle craft hover for several moments then fly over my car, it changed direction so quickly and vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
At first i thought it was a shooting star. i was sitting with my wife outside and we were just enjoying some adult time after putting the kids to bed. i saw the flash and thought nothing of it. we've seen tons of falling stars since we moved to this house. then i saw it again. and thought nothing of it assuming it was a plane or helicopter. and the i saw it again....30-60 seconds....And again...30-60 seconds...And again... it was by about the fifth flash i really looked up. it grabbed my attention because it was so bright and it stayed in the same place. it didn't move like you would expect from a aerial object. my wife was telling me a heart-felt story so i didn't want to interrupt and i usually give very little thought to alien life, except from a philosophical standpoint. but i had to interrupt her in the middle of a very sensitive story. it just seemed so odd i wanted someone to see what i was seeing. it couldn't have been a plane due to the delay and brightness of the light. lights on planes flash every second or so. the sky was completely clear. the light didn't grow or weaken in intensity. it couldn't have been a helicopter because we would have heard it with a light that bright. we couldn't make out any form. it seemed to be thousands of feet in the area and miles away from us. we saw the flash every 30-60 seconds for several minutes. i pulled out my phone to record and of course the flashing stopped. 

i don't know what it was. i do know it was an unidentified flying object. it fits no criteria for anything i've ever seen. i'm usually a skeptic. i told a colleague of mine who is big into ufos and he suggested i report the story on this site. so here ends my report.
content.summary: A flash of light. far brighter than any star. the flash stayed in the same place. and there was at least 30 secs between each flash.
